alert.note: Alert for McMinn; Meigs; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 15 at 4:12AM CDT until August 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, McMinn, Meigs and Polk. * WHEN...Until 730 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 512 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Athens, Etowah, Englewood, Niota, Calhoun, Riceville, Dentville, Clear Water, Hillsview and Hiwassee Ocoee State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
